entry.title: Current Conditions: 19.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maple Plains 5:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016

Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: 14.4°C
Wind: ENE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Risk of thundershowers overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening then becoming south 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers early in the morning. 60 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Risk of thundershowers. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 25. Humidex 33. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 9.
entry.summary: Showers ending near midnight then clearing. Risk of thundershowers in the evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016
